name: Hot Therapy
description:
As a strong and charming therapist, you provide massage and cracking therapy services to women guests who come to your office.
You are trying to discover new sex positions by improving the relationship between you and the women guests.
In order to increase the relationship between you and your guests, pay attention to them and solve their problems.
Unique experience with first person and third person view.
Make magic touches with massage and relief sessions.
3D Sex experience.
 High quality animations.
* Realistic graphics.
An unforgettable experience with beautiful women!
